content: this pattern is for crocheted pull-on soaker shorts and pants the sizes range from preemie to x-large and there are also directions for customizing the fit to your baby it is crocheted in the round with worsted weight 100% wool yarn and features ribbing in the legs and waistband and a drawstring waist there are also instructions for finishing the soaker without ribbing if that is preferred you can make approximately 1-4 pairs of shorts or 1-3 pairs of pants with fisherman s wool depending on the size you make
